summary: This is a Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York staff assignment roster for Saturday, August 10, 2019. It details post assignments, shift changes, and officer statuses (sick leave, annual leave) for the facility. The document is significant as it shows the staffing and operational schedule for the day Jeffrey Epstein died in custody.

persons.name: Lewis
persons.context: Appears as an officer with a status change (Sick/Annual) on the roster.

events.title: MCC New York Staff Roster
events.description: Standard daily assignment roster for correctional staff at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, detailing posts, shifts, and leave statuses.

keyFacts: This is the staff assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York for Saturday, August 10, 2019.
The document details posts, shift times (e.g., 06:00-14:00), and officer statuses including 'Sick Leave', 'Annual Leave', 'Day Off', and 'LWOP' (Leave Without Pay).
It shows a high number of shift changes and status updates, with many posts listed as '<unassigned>'.
The roster includes specialized posts relevant to inmate monitoring such as 'PHONE MONITOR', 'SEARCH OFFICER', 'DRY CELL', 'SHU' (Special Housing Unit), and 'ATTY CONF' (Attorney Conference).
The document was processed or filed on August 2, 2021, as indicated by the timestamp '8/2/2021' on each page.
